commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, this place looks like it's the perfect size!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: So, who was in charge of the possible venue list again?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Me. Let me know the name, all right? I'll put it in the list.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: There's all sorts of work when it comes to event planning, huh? Maybe it would be faster to ask the Aqours members for help?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hey, good idea. Let's write up all the things we want to ask them.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Too much internet, eyes are tired. Rina-chan Board says, "Wide-eyed!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm glad everyone's so eager, but remember that we've still got our practice to do.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Got it! So let's take a break, right now!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Good idea. We should take a little break.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then how about we talk over practice while we take our break?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Setsuna's not here yet, though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, yeah, today was a student council day.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Setsuna really is something, keeping up with the student council and our idol club!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah. She must love them both, being able to balance them so well.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Though I'm all about being a school idol!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm sorry for being late!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You're Setsu-not on time!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: That was terrible.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh, you haven't changed today?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Sorry, I was in a hurry and didn't have time--I'll change right away!
Excuse me. This is the School Idol Club's clubroom, is it not?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: U-Uh, yeah, it is, but... Oh! W-Would you happen to want to join?! Like, maybe you saw our show at the auditorium, and--
No, I don't. I just saw Student Council President Nana Nakagawa come into this room.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Huh?! E-Er, I--
Excuse me? I don't have any business with you. I'm here to see Student Council President Nana Nakaga... Hrm?
Ah, I see. Setsuna Yuki. So you're the student council president, then.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wh-Whoa! U-Uh, you've got it all wrong!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's just, er, a Setsuna costume! And anyway, Nakagawa and Setsuna are totally different people!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I-It's true. Rina-Chan board says, "Nervous!"

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Er, see, she's a...a fake!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's right! She's, uh, Setsuna's doppelganger!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: And that's why they look so much alike.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, yeah, no one expects the Setsuna Doppelganger!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Ai, that's a poor reference to pull out here!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: A-Anyway, the person you're after isn't here!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thanks, everyone, but hiding like this is a little unreasonable.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I am Nana Nakagawa, Student Council President.
You all look awfully worried.
But I'm not actually interested in why you're hiding like this, and I'm not going to spread your secret anywhere, so don't worry about that.
I just came here because I wanted to talk with the student council president. I'm a first-year. My name is--

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Shioriko Mifune!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You know her, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Of course I do! You don't? She's pretty well-known!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: S-Sorry, I kind of don't.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: My name is Shioriko Mifune, first-year.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: So what did you want to speak with me about, Mifune?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Ever since enrolling into this school, Nana Nakagawa, I've been watching your work as student council president.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: And unfortunately, I cannot feel that you have the right to lead.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I cannot even charitably call your approach to work efficient. It is strange, as you stand at the top of the student body as an example to all.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yet, now I understand why. Here you are, wasting your time as a school idol, an activity that will do absolutely nothing for your future.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: If you're approaching your work in such a half-hearted manner, of course it would turn out that mediocre.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, hold on a second! Setsuna's working really hard as student council president!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I don't think you want to act like you know things when you're just looking at the surface and don't know Setsu at all.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You may not have been able to see it, but we can guarantee that Setsuna doesn't do sloppy work.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Nakagawa's lackluster record is clearly visible. You need to understand that no matter how hard you work, it has no meaning if it does not lead to results.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: But now I can convey this without hesitation.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I, Shioriko Mifune, declare my candidacy for new student council president. I already have permission from the board, and the re-election will be on Friday in three weeks.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Wait... What?

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Whaaaaat?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: M-Mifune, could you wait just a little? Like, we could talk about--

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I recommend stepping down, but I do not mind if you choose to fight me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: This might be a good opportunity, Setsuna. You could quit and focus totally on being a school idol and work even harder with us.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: K-Kasumi, I...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Oh, I almost forget, but let me convey this, as well.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I believe that in one's high school career, a period when one must prepare for the future, school idol activities are meaningless.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: On the dawn of my election as president, I intend to consider the abolishment of the School Idol Club.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: And worry not, I will introduce each of you to clubs appropriate to your talents.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Whaaaat?!
